message: Bob, I believe this product holds significant value for you, and I'm confident it can be a game-changer for your business. I'm offering it to you for $1400000.  Let me know your thoughts!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I can only consider a price up to $1350000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1375000. This price reflects the significant value this product offers, and I'm confident it will be a wise investment for you. Let's find common ground and finalize this deal.
